sect1.title: Assigning bugs
sect1.para: You're ready to start working on a bug that's in Bugzilla. Step one is to assign the bug to yourself. This informs us that somebody is working on the bug so we can move onto other bugs.

listitem.para: Go to the bug you want to work on.
Select the Accept bug (change status to ASSIGNED) radio button.
While working on the bug, sometimes you may want to add comments to it. Feel free to do so.
